div.div: The fiscal cliff looms. Wars rage around the globe. Apple Maps wasn't everything they promised. Yes, there are reasons to despair. But you shouldn't do that. You should be excited. Particularly when it comes to snapping 1s and 0s back and forth. Particularly when it comes to dreaming up the future.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/S2hfQF&via=Digg&text=Reasons To Be Excited For 2013

div.a: Top 10 Reasons Why We Know The Earth Is Round

div.div: In case you were still on the fence, here are ten reasons why we know the Earth is round.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Rnkm4d&via=Digg&text=Top 10 Reasons Why We Know The Earth Is Round

div.a: Are Video Games Easier Than They Used To Be?

div.div: Something is holding video games back from satisfying those of us who seek a good challenge.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U0jTae&via=Digg&text=Are Video Games Easier Than They Used To Be?

div.a: How To Build Your Own Google Glass

div.div: If Google is able to start developing Google Glass, it means that the components are now available and anyone should be able to follow suit. So I decided to do just that, even though I knew the final product wouldn’t be as sleek as Google’s and the software wouldn’t be as polished.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10FBpCw&via=Digg&text=How To Build Your Own Google Glass

div.a: Google Is Attacking Apple From The Inside Out—And It's Working

div.div: After years of hammering away at Apple's share of the smartphone market with cheap-to-free Android phones, Google has lately adopted a new tactic to win mobile.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TsLFK7&via=Digg&text=Google Is Attacking Apple From The Inside Out—And It's Working

div.div: IF EDGAR ALLEN POE MADE A VIDEO GAME

div.a: The Creepiest Game You've Never Heard Of

div.div: Back in the mid 1990s, some unique stuff happened in gaming, but few things are weirder than the bizarre PC adventure game The Dark Eye: A puppet adventure game based on the works of Edgar Allan Poe and starring one of the 20th century's most influential authors, William S. Burroughs.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UEEG1z&via=Digg&text=The Creepiest Game You've Never Heard Of

div.a: What We Imagined For 2013 — 10 Years Ago

div.div: Ten years ago, we boldly declared that we’d be living with phones on our wrists, data-driven goggles on our eyes and gadgets that would safety-test our food for us.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UFNh4c&via=Digg&text=What We Imagined For 2013 — 10 Years Ago

div.a: Samuel L. Jackson Wanted A ‘Breaking Bad’ Cameo For Nick Fury

div.div: If you're anything like me, then you're probably wondering why Earth's mightiest heroes didn't give a call to crystal chemistry expert Walter White when researching the properties of the Tesseract.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UfCLyg&via=Digg&text=Samuel L. Jackson Wanted A ‘Breaking Bad’ Cameo For Nick Fury

div.a: The Life Of Pi, And Other Infinities

div.div: Fascinating article on infinity, or more accurately all the infinities that encompass us. nytimes.com/2013/01/01/sci...

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WWOUZG&via=Digg&text=The Life Of Pi, And Other Infinities

div.div: AT LEAST HE REMEMBERED TO CALL

div.a: Mars Rover's 'Special' New Year's Message Is Anything But

div.div: NASA promised a special New Year’s Eve message from the Curiosity rover, and true to its word, one played out to the crowd during the celebrations at Times Square in New York City.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TujE4Z&via=Digg&text=Mars Rover's 'Special' New Year's Message Is Anything But

div.div: NOT CURED BY A KNOCK ON THE HEAD

div.a: What It's Like To Have Retrograde Amnesia

div.div: "Please forgive me for asking this, but I do this with everybody. Could you tell me your name again and how it is that I know you?"

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/1300WEZ&via=Digg&text=What It's Like To Have Retrograde Amnesia

div.a: You've Heard Of A Leap Day, But Why Do We Need A Leap Second?

div.div: Every now and then we have to insert a leap second because the Earth’s rotation is slowing down. Could we speed up Earth’s rotation, so that we do not need Leap Seconds?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10HXPTK&via=Digg&text=You've Heard Of A Leap Day, But Why Do We Need A Leap Second?

div.div: Three years ago when a Jordanian suicide bomber killed 7 U.S. intelligence officers, jihadists praised his bravery and the CIA blamed his ideology, but bullying explains his treachery.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VbThit&via=Digg&text=How Bullying Creates Suicide Bombers

div.a: Armed Robbers Hit Apple Store In Paris

div.div: Apple was hit New Year's Eve by an armed robbery in one of its Paris stores, the first major robbery of an Apple store in France.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TENMtd&via=Digg&text=Armed Robbers Hit Apple Store In Paris

div.a: Debate Still Rages On The 150th Anniversary Of The Emancipation Proclamation

div.div: On Jan. 1, 1863, President Lincoln signed the Emancipation Proclamation freeing an estimated 500,000 slaves, changing the course of the Civil War, and revolutionizing America. Here's what happened on that fateful day—and the still raging debate over its achievements.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/TCZKU0&via=Digg&text=Debate Still Rages On The 150th Anniversary Of The Emancipation Proclamation

div.a: Google's New Year's Day Logo Cleans Up After The New Year's Eve Logo

div.div: Today on Google’s home page, you will find a special logo for New Year’s Day. The logo represents what most people and venues are doing during the day after New Year’s Eve – cleaning up.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U4ddrI&via=Digg&text=Google's New Year's Day Logo Cleans Up After The New Year's Eve Logo

div.a: PSY Appears As Violent Rapist In Japanese Comic Book

div.div: When the Korean media discovered a Japanese manga that parodies PSY as a member of a Korean gang that abducts, tortures, and eventually rapes a group of Japanese high school girls, the internet masses erupted in fury.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VEYHjX&via=Digg&text=PSY Appears As Violent Rapist In Japanese Comic Book

div.a: How Rich People Celebrated New Year's Eve In The Gilded Age

div.div: Why we drink champagne on the holiday, and other curiosities

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UzxAdJ&via=Digg&text=How Rich People Celebrated New Year's Eve In The Gilded Age

div.a: What The Deal Over The Fiscal Cliff Does And Doesn’t Mean

div.div: Virtually nobody likes the deal. Liberals think it grants too many concessions to the wealthy and leaves the government still hostage to talks over the debt ceiling. Conservatives are angry at having to allow any tax hikes at all.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10GV8S9&via=Digg&text=What The Deal Over The Fiscal Cliff Does And Doesn’t Mean

div.a: World's Tallest Building Becomes Giant Fireworks Show

div.div: The spectacular Burj Khalifa fireworks show in Dubai, featuring the Prague Philharmonic Orchestra.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/UBfA2G&via=Digg&text=World's Tallest Building Becomes Giant Fireworks Show

div.div: Starting today, female and male models who have a body mass index (BMI) of less than 18.5 may not be shown in the media or on Israeli websites or go down the catwalk at fashion shows.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12V6z8A&via=Digg&text=Israel Bans Too-Thin Models
